Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Kings Beach, Rolling Surf Resort is by the ocean, minutes from Kings Beach, and close to Bulcock Beach. This 4.5-star apartment is within close proximity of Caloundra Events Center and Shelly Beach.

Rooms
Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 60 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring private spa tubs. Kitchens are outfitted with full-sized refrigerators/freezers, stovetops, and microwaves. Cable programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature jetted bathtubs and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, an arcade/game room, and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include laundry facilities and an elevator (lift). Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Kings Beach, Rolling Surf Resort is by the ocean, minutes from Kings Beach, and close to Bulcock Beach. This 4.5-star apartment is within close proximity of Caloundra Events Center and Shelly Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kings Beach - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Bulcock Beach - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Caloundra Events Center - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Shelly Beach - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Moffat Beach - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Dickey Beach - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Pelican Waters Golf Club - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Kawana Beach - 11 km / 6.8 mi
Aussie World - 11.1 km / 6.9 mi
Underwater World Sea Life - 13.6 km / 8.4 mi
Mooloolaba Beach - 13.9 km / 8.6 mi
Sunshine Plaza - 17.4 km / 10.8 mi
Landsborough Museum - 17.4 km / 10.8 mi
Australia Zoo - 18.4 km / 11.4 mi
Twin Waters Golf Club - 20.2 km / 12.6 mi

The preferred airport for Rolling Surf Resort is Maroochydore, QLD (MCY-Sunshine Coast) - 22.7 km / 14.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest airports to Rolling Surf Resort are:
Maroochydore, QLD (MCY-Sunshine Coast) - 14.5 mi
